Pregnancy Testing

Contraception 
Females: Advise female patients of reproductive potential to use effective 
contraception during treatment and for at least 2 weeks after the last dose of 
TRADENAME. Advise patients that TRADENAME can reduce the effectiveness of oral 
contraceptives and to use alternative effective contraception during treatment with
